course_description: This Goizueta elective takes a real-world approach to learning about the global capital markets by simulating life on the trading floor of a brokerage firm, hedge fund or international corporation.  Each class begins with a "morning call" - a detailed discussion of the markets and recent market events, to simulate a real-world trading environment.  All class activities are practical and hands-on, demystifying trading and derivatives and applying theory to investing in the global markets.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
